attributes.action: pass a motion forcing cadbury to return creme eggs to their pre 1997 size
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has come to our attention that cadbury are slowly and secretly reducing the size of their creme eggs without any reduction in price. We would like cadbury to remedee this by either increasing the size of the eggs or reducing the price of them.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
